items.title: Mark Carney’s wife, children, and family life as Canadian election begins
items.description: Mark Carney met his English wife Diana when they were both members of the Oxford University Ice Hockey Club.

items.title: Mystery of the Bennington Triangle where people keep going missing
items.description: Five missing people, tall-tales of a big foot and man-eating rock; welcome to Bennington, Vermont.

items.title: Receipt artist creates supermarket bills with A to Z of items and a Trump prank
items.description: You cannot guess what he used for Z.

items.title: Man plans to use World War II bomb found in his garden as beer cooler
items.description: The bomb's discovery lead to Ross' street being shut with an explosive ordnance disposal unit ensured the device was safe.
